articles.title: The winter storm tested power grids straining to accommodate AI data centers
articles.desc: The colossal winter storm that swept across 34 states left hundreds of thousands of people without electricity. Bitterly cold temperatures lingering after Winter Storm Fern are still testing power grids, already under stress from a rush of new AI data centers…
